comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: I'm having trouble following this. Â Maybe just start with the basics, like who is Daniel Evans? Â What casino are you talking about? Â What does it mean to be "muted" by a casino? Â And, are you saying you're being forced to place a $3 million wager in his casino? Â Why?

Or if you insist gambling on devans' site, abide by his rules.Quote from: TrolledOut on July 19, 2022, 12:22:53 AMI have never made a scam accusationLOL, yeah and I'm the Pope.Sounds like that it is an alt account from a well-known (banned) troll @i_am_viralwho else would discuss the topic Scam report Facebook.com besides him? In addition, they use a very similar way of presentation, with additional space between the lines.Quote from: TrolledOut on July 20, 2022, 08:47:33 AMAdding to this thread.Many Facebook users have been utilising my company logo.They refuse DMCA requests.I have to get legal with them.This company allows IP Theft

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: TrolledOut on July 20, 2022, 10:32:45 AMAn injustice is occurring frequently and all you care about, is over-analysing user profiles?I don't get bent out of shape about multi-accounts unless they're being used for cheating or violating the forum's rules, but you'll have to forgive the others for their suspicions.Â  Most (not all) of the time folks have multiple accounts is for nefarious reasons.Â  Even though I'm not convinced that you are being honest that this is first account here, I tend to agree with your comment; an alleged injustice may have occurred, that should be the primary focus.Â  Furthermore, your presentation comes off as confrontational right from the get-go.Â  One of the reasons I was confused is because your OP sounds as if this has been an ongoing drama of which we've all been aware.Â  That may be the reason you raised suspicion from others.If you want to be taken seriously I have a suggestion; use the standard scam reporting template, and provide as much detail as possible.Â  Include screenshots, if you have them.Â  You won't be able to post images, but you can post links to the images.Â  If someone feels the images are of value they may quote you to make your images visible here in this thread.Here's the template for a typical scam accusation:Quote from: escrow.ms on July 21, 2013, 05:28:05 PMCode:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 20, 2022, 01:45:20 PMI don't get bent out of shape about multi-accounts unless they're being used for cheating or violating the forum's rules, but you'll have to forgive the others for their suspicions.Â  Most (not all) of the time folks have multiple accounts is for nefarious reasons.Â  Even though I'm not convinced that you are being honest that this is first account here, I tend to agree with your comment; an alleged injustice may have occurred, that should be the primary focus.Â  Alleged injustice of being muted in a casino trollbox?Â  The rules are quite lax so being muted/banned/whatever means the OP is an exceptionally obtuse degen, probably begging or some shit like that and apparently they've done it repeatedly. Nothing of value was stolen or otherwise scammed as far as I can see and the OP should just go gamble elsewhere if the owner/admin of the site doesn't want them there.Quote from: https://www.bustabit.com/help/chat-rulesWhat are the chat rules?Â  Â  1. Don't ask for money anywhere including in private messages and the spam channel. Asking for loans or investments and implying that other players should give you money is equivalent.Â  Â  2. Don't advertise. This includes trade and job offers as well as referral and affiliate links. Advertising in the spam channel is tolerated as long as you don't automate posting your ads.Â  Â  3. Don't use multiple accounts to chat at the same time or to evade mutes. Using an account to chat while muted on another account may lead to it being muted as well.Â  Â  4. Don't share accounts with other players, even temporarily. If they become muted or banned for breaking the chat rules, your accounts might end up being muted or banned as well.Â  Â  5. Beware of scammers! bustabit is not a trading site and won't get involved in disputes between players under any circumstances. We highly recommend not trading here.

I had no idea what you were talking about until I read it ðŸ¤£I thought that comment was pretty funny too, since I was reading it on a public forum, but he did go on to explain that he was banned from Bustabit's chat box...Quote from: suchmoon on July 20, 2022, 06:23:30 PMAlleged injustice of being muted in a casino trollbox?Â  Lol, yeah.Â  If he was as charming in the casino's chat room as he's been here, then I can't imagine why he would be blocked.Â  Quote from: TrolledOut on July 20, 2022, 07:58:24 PMwhen funds are safeguarded on their bot, you no longer have access as you are unable to speak with the bot privately to !withdrawI still don't get this.Â  If they have your money then you should be able to get it out by contacting their tech support, even if they've banned you, right?Â  Is this money that you deposited?Quote from: TrolledOut on July 20, 2022, 07:58:24 PMThis negativity is on par with Bustabit and I'm not going to tolerate it.This is no place for the thin-skinned.Â  If you come here to complain about one of the oldest crypto casinos, one that has supported this community for quite some time, and can't handle a bit of scrutiny when you present no evidence, then maybe this isn't the place for you.

comments.body: You got muted for acting like an idiot, then come here crying over it? You realize that a mute from Devans starts out small and grows with each infraction. They're not gonna mute you for 100 bitcoins wagered unless you're just acting a fool in the chat.
